div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society minute and letter book, pp.35-6, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor to inform you by direction of the Trustees of the Royal Park that at their meeting on the 21st inst the letter from the Townclerk to yourself was duly considered & that after due inquiry it was ascertained that the Superintendent was perfectly justified in his interference when on some recent occasions the Park regulations became by certain parties very much disregarded. A communication explanatory of all circumstances has been made to Mr Fitzgibbon
See M to E. Fitzgibbon, 24 September 1869. See also E. Lissignol to M et al., 21 September 1869.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be Sir

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
